subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer of Germany closed in on a Ryder Cup berth when he shot a 67 for a six-stroke lead heading into the final day of the BMW International Open in Munich.
snippet: Martin Kaymer of Germany closed in on a Ryder Cup berth when he shot a 67 for a six-stroke lead heading into the final day of the BMW International Open in Munich.
